## 1.
```{r}
counter <- 0
bi_nom <- rbinom(20,30,.5)

for (i in length(bi_nom)) {
  if (bi_nom[i] %% 10 == 0) next
    counter <- 1 + counter
  return(counter)
}
```


## 2.
```{r}
print(counter <- length(bi_nom[bi_nom %% 10 == 0]) + counter)
```
